definition: The term "Nächste" refers to the individual or thing that follows immediately after another in a sequence or order. It is commonly used to describe the immediate next person, object, or event in a series or progression.

examples.german: Die nächste Station ist der Hauptbahnhof.
examples.english: The next station is the main train station.

examples.german: Der nächste Termin ist am Montag um 10 Uhr.
examples.english: The next appointment is on Monday at 10 o'clock.

examples.german: Die nächste Woche wird sehr stressig sein.
examples.english: The next week will be very stressful.

examples.german: Der nächste Bus fährt in 15 Minuten ab.
examples.english: The next bus departs in 15 minutes.

examples.german: Die nächste Prüfung findet am Freitag statt.
examples.english: The next exam will take place on Friday.
